Types

GitRepoState = enum
  rsNone = (0, "none"), rsMerge = (1, "merge"), rsRevert = (2, "revert"),
  rsRevertSequence = (3, "revert sequence"), rsCherrypick = (4, "cherrypick"),
  rsCherrypickSequence = (5, "cherrypick sequence"), rsBisect = (6, "bisect"),
  rsRebase = (7, "rebase"), rsRebaseInteractive = (8, "rebase interactive"),
  rsRebaseMerge = (9, "rebase merge"), rsApplyMailbox = (10, "apply mailbox"),
  rsApplyMailboxOrRebase = (11, "apply mailbox or rebase")
GitStatusShow = enum
  ssIndexAndWorkdir = (0, "index and workdir"), ssIndexOnly = (1, "index only"),
  ssWorkdirOnly = (2, "workdir only")
GitStatusOption = enum
  soIncludeUntracked = (1, "include untracked"),
  soIncludeIgnored = (2, "include ignored"),
  soIncludeUnmodified = (4, "include unmodified"),
  soExcludeSubmodules = (8, "exclude submodules"),
  soRecurseUntrackedDirs = (16, "recurse untracked dirs"),
  soDisablePathspecMatch = (32, "disable pathspec match"),
  soRecurseIgnoredDirs = (64, "recurse ignored dirs"),
  soRenamesHeadToIndex = (128, "renames head to index"),
  soRenamesIndexToWorkdir = (256, "renames index to workdir"),
  soSortCaseSensitively = (512, "sort case sensitively"),
  soSortCaseInsensitively = (1024, "sort case insensitively"),
  soRenamesFromRewrites = (2048, "renames from rewrites"),
  soNoRefresh = (4096, "no refresh"), soUpdateIndex = (8192, "update index"),
  soIncludeUnreadable = (16384, "include unreadable")
GitResultCode = enum
  grcOk = (0, "ok"), grcError = (1, "generic error"), grcNotFound = (3, "not found"),
  grcExists = (4, "object exists"), grcAmbiguous = (5, "ambiguous match"),
  grcBuffer = (6, "buffer overflow"), grcUser = (7, "user-specified"),
  grcBareRepo = (8, "bare repository"), grcUnbornBranch = (9, "unborn branch"),
  grcUnmerged = (10, "unmerged"), grcNonFastForward = (11, "not fast-forward"),
  grcInvalidSpec = (12, "invalid spec"), grcConflict = (13, "conflict"),
  grcLocked = (14, "locked"), grcModified = (15, "modified"),
  grcAuthentication = (16, "authentication"), grcCertificate = (17, "certificate"),
  grcApplied = (18, "applied"), grcPeel = (19, "peel"),
  grcEndOfFile = (20, "end-of-file"), grcInvalid = (21, "invalid"),
  grcUncommitted = (22, "uncommitted"), grcDirectory = (23, "directory"),
  grcMergeConflict = (24, "merge conflict"), grcPassThrough = (30, "pass-through"),
  grcIterOver = (31, "end of iteration"), grcRetry = (32, "retry"),
  grcMismatch = (33, "hash mismatch"), grcIndexDirty = (34, "dirty index"),
  grcApplyFail = (35, "patch failed")
GitErrorClass = enum
  gecNone = (0, "none"), gecNoMemory = (1, "no memory"), gecOS = (2, "os"),
  gecInvalid = (3, "invalid"), gecReference = (4, "reference"), gecZlib = (5, "zlib"),
  gecRepository = (6, "repository"), gecConfig = (7, "config"),
  gecRegEx = (8, "regex"), gecODB = (9, "odb"), gecIndex = (10, "index"),
  gecObject = (11, "object"), gecNet = (12, "network"), gecTag = (13, "tag"),
  gecTree = (14, "tree"), gecIndexer = (15, "indexer"), gecSSL = (16, "ssl"),
  gecSubModule = (17, "submodule"), gecThread = (18, "thread"),
  gecStash = (19, "stash"), gecCheckOut = (20, "check out"),
  gecFetchHead = (21, "fetch head"), gecMerge = (22, "merge"), gecSSH = (23, "ssh"),
  gecFilter = (24, "filter"), gecRevert = (25, "revert"),
  gecCallBack = (26, "call back"), gecCherryPick = (27, "cherry pick"),
  gecDescribe = (28, "describe"), gecReBase = (29, "re-base"),
  gecFileSystem = (30, "filesystem"), gecPatch = (31, "patch"),
  gecWorkTree = (32, "work tree"), gecSHA1 = (33, "sha1")
GitObject = ptr git_object
GitObjectKind = enum
  goAny = (0, "object"), goBad = (1, "invalid"), goCommit = (3, "commit"),
  goTree = (4, "tree"), goBlob = (5, "blob"), goTag = (6, "tag"), goOfsDelta = (8, "ofs"),
  goRefDelta = (9, "ref")
GitThing = ref object
  o*: GitObject
  case kind*: GitObjectKind
  of goTag:
      nil

  of goRefDelta:
      nil

  else:
      nil

  
GitOid = ptr git_oid
GitRemote = ptr git_remote
GitReference = ptr git_reference
GitRepository = ptr git_repository
GitStrArray = ptr git_strarray
GitTag = ptr git_tag
GitCommit = ptr git_commit
GitClone = object
  url*: cstring
  directory*: cstring
  repo*: GitRepository
  options*: ptr git_clone_options

GitOpen = object
  path*: cstring
  repo*: GitRepository

GitTagTable = OrderedTableRef[string, GitThing]
GitStatus = ptr git_status_entry
GitStatusList = ptr git_status_list

Consts

DefaultStatusFlags = {soIncludeUntracked..soIncludeIgnored, soIncludeUnmodified,
                    soExcludeSubmodules, soDisablePathspecMatch,
                    soRenamesHeadToIndex, soRenamesIndexToWorkdir,
                    soSortCaseSensitively, soRenamesFromRewrites, soUpdateIndex,
                    soIncludeUnreadable}
